sn43.15:1.1: Saccanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami saccagaminca maggam.
sn43.16:1.1: Paranca vo, bhikkhave, desessami paragaminca maggam.
sn43.17:1.1: Nipunanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami nipunagaminca maggam.
sn43.18:1.1: Sududdasanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami sududdasagaminca maggam.
sn43.19:1.1: Ajajjaranca vo, bhikkhave, desessami ajajjaragaminca maggam.
sn43.20:1.1: Dhuvanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami dhuvagaminca maggam.
sn43.21:1.1: Apalokitanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami apalokitagaminca maggam.
sn43.22:1.1: Anidassananca vo, bhikkhave, desessami anidassanagaminca maggam.
sn43.23:1.1: Nippapancanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami nippapancagaminca maggam.
sn43.24:1.1: Santanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami santagaminca maggam.
sn43.25:1.1: Amatanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami amatagaminca maggam.
sn43.26:1.1: Panitanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami panitagaminca maggam.
sn43.27:1.1: Sivanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami sivagaminca maggam.
sn43.28:1.1: Khemanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami khemagaminca maggam.
sn43.29:1.1: Tanhakkhayanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami tanhakkhayagaminca maggam.
sn43.30:1.1: Acchariyanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami acchariyagaminca maggam.
sn43.31:1.1: Abbhutanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami abbhutagaminca maggam.
sn43.32:1.1: Anitikanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami anitikagaminca maggam.
sn43.33:1.1: Anitikadhammanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami anitikadhammagaminca maggam.
sn43.34:1.1: Nibbananca vo, bhikkhave, desessami nibbanagaminca maggam.
sn43.35:1.1: Abyabajjhanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami abyabajjhagaminca maggam.
sn43.36:1.1: Viraganca vo, bhikkhave, desessami viragagaminca maggam.
sn43.37:1.1: Suddhinca vo, bhikkhave, desessami suddhigaminca maggam.
sn43.37:1.2: Tam sunatha. Katama ca, bhikkhave, suddhi …pe….
sn43.38:1.1: Muttinca vo, bhikkhave, desessami muttigaminca maggam.
sn43.38:1.2: Tam sunatha. Katama ca, bhikkhave, mutti …pe….
sn43.39:1.1: Analayanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami analayagaminca maggam.
sn43.39:1.2: Tam sunatha. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, analayo …pe….
sn43.40:1.1: Dipanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami dipagaminca maggam.
sn43.41:1.1: Lenanca vo, bhikkhave, desessami lenagaminca maggam.
sn43.42:1.1: Tananca vo, bhikkhave, desessami tanagaminca maggam.
sn43.43:1.1: Sarananca vo, bhikkhave, desessami saranagaminca maggam.
